mapper.select: select t_attachment_file_id, t_attachment_file_name, t_attachment_file_type, t_attachment_file_order, t_attachment_file_code from t_attachment_file where t_attachment_file_id = #{tAttachmentFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select t_attachment_file_id, t_attachment_file_name, t_attachment_file_type, t_attachment_file_order, t_attachment_file_code from t_attachment_file where t_attachment_file_status = 1
